activities: SeatonCorp and its operating subsidiaries (PeopleScout, StudentScout, Staff Management) ("SeatonCorp") receive personal information ("PI") associated with residents of the European Union ("EU").  This PI may be received directly from individuals (in which SeatonCorp acts as a "Data Collector") or from third parties (in which SeatonCorp acts as a "Data Processor").  SeatonCorp processes PI in order to find employment for individuals and to process HR-related information as an outsourced HR contractor.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Romania, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
privacyprograms: SeatonCorp is not a member of a privacy program.
